text:
When trying to set up a more than one Virtual host, the DocumentRoot directive 
does not seem to work properly. What I find is that the second virtual host 
does not allow the files to be read or parsed. The domain is however the files 
do not execute. If I put the same files in the default virtualroot'd directory 
then the files work fine but as soon as the files are only in the second 
virtual root's documentroot then Apache gives me a 501 error saying it could 
not find the files. HELP!!
creator: jaunf@pdsg.co.za

text:
I suggest that you address you problem on a user-support forum like
http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html

When you do so, please be more specific about exactly what your configuration
looks like, where the files are located, what type of files they are, and
exactly what the error message is.  (501 is not "file not found", so there
must be a mistake somewhere.)

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: slive@apache.org
